mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.desc: We provide seamless mobile app development services that will enable you to get an app compatible with all operating systems including android, ios, e.t.c.

website.title: Website Development
website.desc: We provide unique website development services to make your digital presence more solid. We developed websites through trending development technologies to personalize your business platform.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.desc: We provide quality test service in which we find flaws of your apps, softwares and websites. The main purpose behind this test is to make customer’s business software compatible with market trends.

marketing.title: Digital Marketing
marketing.desc: We drive traffic to your business through using different digital practices. This helps to increase your business reach that brings sales and also raises your brand awareness.

infrastructure.title: IT Infrastructure
infrastructure.desc: We offer step by step support for your business operations. Network designing, cloud migration and cybersecurity are those services that we offer for your IT infrastructure.

consulting.title: IT consulting
consulting.desc: Know the market trends and develop a result oriented strategy to get best possible results on your investments. We do this through our consultation service.

TeachersPanel.title: Teaching Dashboard
TeachersPanel.desc: With a personalized teaching dashboard, teachers can manage their schedules, tasks, and listed communications.

TeachersPanel.title: Resource Sharing
TeachersPanel.desc: Creating and sharing notes, PDFs, and lesson plans is all possible for resource sharing.

TeachersPanel.title: Attendance Management
TeachersPanel.desc: With built-in biometric sync, teachers can analyze the attendance of students.

TeachersPanel.title: Assignment Manager
TeachersPanel.desc: With the role of assignment manager, teachers can check, arrange, and assign tasks, while collecting and marking them is also an inbuilt feature on Vigo.

TeachersPanel.title: Exam Creation
TeachersPanel.desc: No paperwork; the teacher will sit on screen and create exams, whether they are MCQ-based or descriptive papers.

TeachersPanel.title: Evaluation Panel
TeachersPanel.desc: This panel specifically helps teachers in remarking on the student’s numbers to give a final score.

TeachersPanel.title: Student Performance Reports
TeachersPanel.desc: Checking student’s papers and creating their batch-wise marking sheets is also effortless with Vigo.

TeachersPanel.title: Communication Interface
TeachersPanel.desc: With a personalized communication section, teachers can stay in touch with students while communicating with parents, through it is also easy for them.

TeachersPanel.title: Leave Request & Approval
TeachersPanel.desc: This panel is specifically designed for teachers, where they can send leave requests to the administration for approval.

TeachersPanel.title: Disciplinary Record Input
TeachersPanel.desc: By analyzing student’s behaviors, teachers can set rewards or punishments based on behalf of student’s approach.

TeachersPanel.title: Student Feedback Logs
TeachersPanel.desc: Teachers can collect reviews in the form of feedback from their students to make changes in their teaching behavior or patterns.

TeachersPanel.title: Staff Calendar Integration
TeachersPanel.desc: Teachers have to collaborate in each staff meeting, and that is where this feature helps them.

ParentsPanel.title: Academiic Data Access
ParentsPanel.desc: Vigo allows both students and parents access to the academic data, including assignments, homework, lesson Planning, Notes and Circular.

ParentsPanel.title: Timetable
ParentsPanel.desc: Schools can randomly make changes to the timetable, but with this software, students can keep a close eye on it to understand those changes.

ParentsPanel.title: Personal Dashboards
ParentsPanel.desc: Students have a personalized dashboard where all data regarding their academic performance is available, while parents can also contribute through their profiles.

ParentsPanel.title: Real-Time Attendance
ParentsPanel.desc: Using manual methods or biometrics for logs, students can manage and analyze their real-time attendance status.

ParentsPanel.title: Assignment Submission
ParentsPanel.desc: To submit assignments from the comfort of their home, students can send them digitally and they will get the feedback in the same way.

ParentsPanel.title: Progress Tracker
ParentsPanel.desc: This is an amazing add-on in Vigo school, which allows students to personally track their progress.

ParentsPanel.title: Exam Schedule
ParentsPanel.desc: All data regarding exam schedules, seating, and offered digital passes is accessible to students.

ParentsPanel.title: Live Class Integration
ParentsPanel.desc: To promote digital education, Vigo offers a feature that allows students to join virtual classrooms for advanced studies.

ParentsPanel.title: Hostel Room & Meal Information
ParentsPanel.desc: A detailed section through which students can access information about the regular mess hos, tel inventory, and so on.

ParentsPanel.title: Certifications
ParentsPanel.desc: A detailed section is set for sharing certification-related documents direct with the students.

ParentsPanel.title: Transport Route Info
ParentsPanel.desc: Students have detailed access to the route through which they are going to use their school reach.

ParentsPanel.title: Notifications & Alerts
ParentsPanel.desc: By notifications, students will remain aware of their upcoming events, dues and other happenings.

AdminPanel.title: Academic Management
AdminPanel.desc: Through this centralized dashboard, the administration has the credibility to keep a keen eye on each happening in the institute.

AdminPanel.title: Academic Setup
AdminPanel.desc: It allows admins to complete different functionalities like defining courses, grading systems, and syllabus plans.

AdminPanel.title: Role-Based Access Control
AdminPanel.desc: Allowing control of software happenings to all the staff on behalf of their expertise is also under the admin's powers

AdminPanel.title: Admission Management
AdminPanel.desc: Managing both online and offline admission-related operations is all under the admin's observation.

AdminPanel.title: Fee Management System
AdminPanel.desc: All fee management-related tasks, including fee collection, concession and dues, are handled by the admin.

AdminPanel.title: HRM And Payslip
AdminPanel.desc: After generating payslips, the admin’s verification is compulsory before assigning them to staff.

AdminPanel.title: Finance & Accounting
AdminPanel.desc: Managing detailed budget ledgers, balance sheets, and departmental budgeting is all under the admin stake.

AdminPanel.title: Exam Control
AdminPanel.desc: From setting up exam halls to sharing finalized reports. Admins observe and finalize all exam-related operations

AdminPanel.title: Timetable Management
AdminPanel.desc: All about setting schedules and making changes in timetables are under the handling of admins.

AdminPanel.title: Hostel Management
AdminPanel.desc: Keeping a keen eye on hostel entring and exiting individuals and managing other inventory or meal-related problems are also handled by admins.

AdminPanel.title: Certifications
AdminPanel.desc: Making and offering certificates to their students is also handled by the admin.

AdminPanel.title: Data Backup And Security
AdminPanel.desc: All rights to access the school’s related data, including student’s data and parent’s payment receipts data are included remain under the admin observation for higher security.

benefits.title: Benefits Of School Management
items: A centralized dashboard that lets them monitor every department from one place
Real-time data analytics really helps with smart academic decisions regarding students and financial growth
Admins will collect late fees by sending automated fee reminders
Can protect against data misuse by custom role-based access for staff
Getting transparent records about school finance for audits and compliance
Digital admission module to track inquiries, registrations and enrolments
Can manage online staff attendance with biometric/RFID integrations
Real-time notifications for emergencies or announcements

benefits.title: Benefits For Teachers
items: One-click attendance marking system
Use of the Timetable planner to avoid class overlaps
Digital assignment distribution, collection and marking
AI-based grade calculations with progress tracking to reduce workload
Real-time student performance dashboards to track their learning patterns
A centralized resource hub for sharing study materials
Class-wise automatic academic planner for better organization and no manual error
Alerts for timetable changes or student issues

benefits.title: Benefits For Students & Parents
items: Better communication with teachers and admins that promotes academic tracking
Due to cloud integration, 24/7 access to attendance records and grades
Instant homework updates with the use of the SMS facility
Any time downloadable report cards and performance certifications
Real-time class and subject timetable updates
Parent-teacher communication inboxes
Online leave request & approval system for students
Parents get notified of student achievements or concerns directly

plans.title: Basic Plan
plans.decs: Perfect for Small Institutions or Startups (Upto 300 Students)

plans.title: Advanced Plan
plans.decs: Recommended for Medium to Large Schools (Upto 300 Students)

content: Fee Management System with Online Payment Gateway Integration

offer.title: School ERP Software
offer.desc: School ERP software has global recognition due to its 25+ modules and countless innovative features that let schools manage academic tasks effortlessly and efficiently. It is available on the basis of software as a Saas and offers high connectivity due to cloud integration.

offer.title: Website For School
offer.desc: Our CMS-based website for managing school-related tasks is integrated with Vigo school software, which lets it manage operations efficiently. This integration helps these sites to upload/change academic schedules, curricula, and daily updates with ease.

Academics Management.title: Subject & Syllabus Builder
Academics Management.description: To manage class curriculum management, this software lets you organize subject curricula that are also customizable, which helps in adding subjects, configuring syllabi, and defining prerequisites.

Academics Management.title: Lesson Planning And Resource Sharing
Academics Management.description: Administration can share study material with teachers and help them in planning their lessons for efficient outputs.

Academics Management.title: Scheduling
Academics Management.description: This enables admins to design the schedule for the whole year's happenings, including these are events and holidays, and exam scheduling. This also helps teachers in scheduling weekly coverage.

Academics Management.title: Live Class
Academics Management.description: Teachers or administration can take live virtual classes that promote the atmosphere of digital learning. Here, the integration of Zoom, Google Meet, or custom video platforms collectively helps administration.

Academics Management.title: Attendance Insights
Academics Management.description: This feature allows schools to analyze attendance data, which helps in understanding student’s learning behaviors and academic drops, which helps the administration to use an effective approach for effective results.

Academics Management.title: Grading Formats
Academics Management.description: On behalf of percentages, GPAs, and scorecards, Vigo makes it easy for schools to manage grading. It also helps in conditional formatting and parent-friendly grading.

Academics Management.title: Progress Tracking
Academics Management.description: By analyzing regular attendance and testing reports, teachers or administration can easily track the performance of students. Here, auto low-performance alerts let the administration use effective approaches.

Academics Management.title: Shifts And Semesters
Academics Management.description: Inbuilt features that help in distinguishing the data of different shifts help the administration manage multiple badges. Assigning teachers and study material to different badges is also handled by this feature.

Academics Management.title: Online Submission Panel
Academics Management.description: It helps students by offering a seamless assignment and other data like  PDFs, videos, and code files, submitting offerings, while teachers also get easy access to all that stuff.

Student Management.title: Smart Admission
Student Management.description: This software helps both students and the administration by reducing paperwork during the registration process. Now, students can submit their data online, which can be verified through automation tools.

Student Management.title: Student Dashboard
Student Management.description: By reducing the need for regular work assignments, we assign a personalized dashboard to each student. Here, all data, including academic schedules, extracurriculars, and upcoming exams, are available on the screen.

Student Management.title: Biometric Attendance
Student Management.description: Technology led us to innovation, where repetitive tasks like regular attendance will be managed through automated processes. Facial recognition or completing attendance through fingerprints are both amazing approaches.

Student Management.title: Digital ID Generation
Student Management.description: Students will get their personalized digital IDs that will be generated through this software. These can be barcodes that will allow students to enter libraries and hostels and use the transport service.

Student Management.title: Digital Exams
Student Management.description: To reduce the strain of transportation and make the examination process more comfortable and cost-effective, students can take digital exams. Through different additional integrations, this software helps schools in conducting fair exams.

Student Management.title: PTM Management
Student Management.description: The administration manages parent-teacher meetings and shares the schedule through student profiles. By holding these sessions, administrators encourage both teachers and students to find and correct the loopholes in student’s growth.

Student Management.title: Performance Reports
Student Management.description: With Vigo school management software, teachers can create and share detailed performance reports in which all data regarding their attendance, progress and health is mentioned in detail.

Student Management.title: Document Upload & TC Generation
Student Management.description: This feature enables students to make requests and upload or download certifications. The personalized digital fingerprint also plays its role and secures all the documents with its presence.

Student Management.title: Task Management
Student Management.description: The administration has the credibility to assign specific tasks to targeted students. An inbuilt personalized chat box allows students to chat with teachers and administrators to get extra information regarding assigned tasks.

Transportation/Library /Hostel.title: Live Vehicle Tracking
Transportation/Library /Hostel.description: Through the tool, both administrators and parents can access the live location of school buses. In addition, remaining aware of real-time vehicle speed, and stoppage time is all possible with this software.

Transportation/Library /Hostel.title: Vehicle Driver Details
Transportation/Library /Hostel.description: Vigo offers detailed insights about vehicle numbers and profiles of verified drivers. Further, additional information like vehicle insurance and health stats keeps parents satisfied about their children's safety.

Transportation/Library /Hostel.title: Route Optimization And Transport Fee
Transportation/Library /Hostel.description: AI-powered tools help us in clearing the way by choosing traffic less and clean routes. Further, the built-in feature also manages transport fee cycles with automated billing and so on.

Transportation/Library /Hostel.title: Books Lost Fines
Transportation/Library /Hostel.description: The reports regarding book allotting and losing are handled by the school administration, while forgiving a fine is also under the authority of the administrators.

Transportation/Library /Hostel.title: Book Inventory With Barcoding
Transportation/Library /Hostel.description: With a barcode pass, students can enter and borrow books of their choice. This barcode specifically helps in preventing time loss with a contactless book borrowing process.

Transportation/Library /Hostel.title: Safety Alert
Transportation/Library /Hostel.description: In scenarios of serious conditions, we send safety alerts to the guardians' numbers and the nearest safety authorities. It keeps both the school and parents satisfied.

Transportation/Library /Hostel.title: Hostel Meal Tracking System
Transportation/Library /Hostel.description: This add-on helps schools manage a lot about the meal system, in which tracking kitchen inventory, record consumption patterns and meal planning are included. It also helps the administration in tracking supplies.

Transportation/Library /Hostel.title: Digital Visitor Pass Generation
Transportation/Library /Hostel.description: This QR-code-based pass allows students to enter the hostel without wasting any time in giving verifications. Just scan your identity pass and let in the hostel or library.

Transportation/Library /Hostel.title: Hostel Types And Room Allocation
Transportation/Library /Hostel.description: With Vigo School, which is known as one of the best school management software, we make hostel management effortless. Now, you can settle in hostels and rooms according to your preference.

Exam Management.title: Online/Offline
Exam Management.description: Vigo School encourages virtual examinations with its additional features, while some specific features also help the school in conducting offline exams. It makes exam management effortless, from creating papers to managing grades.

Exam Management.title: Automated Seating
Exam Management.description: This AI-powered seat-assignment feature saves a lot of time for administration and teachers. This automation keeps operations contactless and also offers venue mapping and generating printable hall tickets.

Exam Management.title: Multi-Format Question Paper Generator
Exam Management.description: Automation in this school management software lets teachers generate question papers of multiple kinds in seconds. They just have to input data with a prompt regarding the required paper template.

Exam Management.title: Instant Grading Tools
Exam Management.description: Vigo School is also equipped with features and tools that help teachers generate accurate and fast paper-checking results. This tool can do MCQ checking, while other paper-checking tasks depend on its training.

Exam Management.title: Class Designation
Exam Management.description: On the basis of student’s performances in entry tests or with personalized class entry criteria, this tool will allocate students to their sessions.

Exam Management.title: Exam Center Allocation
Exam Management.description: This software understands the input in which you can share your total students and halls (with their capacity to handle students) and share a worthy and practically possible output.

Exam Management.title: SMS/Email Result Sharing
Exam Management.description: To keep students and parents aware of results, we have built-in SMS sharing and emailing functionalities that can be used on the spot to share fast results.

Exam Management.title: Report Card & Marksheet Builder
Exam Management.description: Vigo School, as a leading software for school management, helps institutes generate error-free and accurate report cards in the form of a detailed performance report.

Exam Management.title: Eligibility Alerts via Attendance
Exam Management.description: With the inbuilt feature of analyzing the exam entrance criteria, Vigo school keeps such students (with lower attendance levels) off the list of examinees.

Payroll & Finance Management.title: Auto Payroll Generation
Payroll & Finance Management.description: This feature lets the administration streamline its monthly payroll operations by using automation. Management of taxes for TDS, PF, ESI, and other deductions can all be handled through these same operations.

Payroll & Finance Management.title: Staff Reimbursement Management
Payroll & Finance Management.description: Staff regularly ask for funds, but the process of the verification of their claims takes a lot of manual effort. Here, this school software uses the latest tools to complete this process.

Payroll & Finance Management.title: Automated Fee Calculation
Payroll & Finance Management.description: The administration does not need to enter each class to ask for fee collections because the software automates these collections. By sending auto-notifications and fee reminders, this software fuels the process.

Payroll & Finance Management.title: SMS Gateway Integration
Payroll & Finance Management.description: A modern and mandatory feature has been added to this software, which is an SMS chatbox, which is a source of communication between the sender and receiver.

Payroll & Finance Management.title: Handling Diverse Accounts
Payroll & Finance Management.description: The administration has to handle multiple kinds of funds, including fees, exam expenditures, regular study material expenditures and monthly debts are included which cannot all be handled by the same individual.

Payroll & Finance Management.title: Monthly And Yearly Financial Reports
Payroll & Finance Management.description: This school software has expertise in designing detailed monthly and yearly financial reports that give error-free spending analytics. This also reveals spending on different sections of the school.

Payroll & Finance Management.title: Department-Wise Budget Planning
Payroll & Finance Management.description: Budget planning on behalf of future changes and upcoming events always gives some clarity that helps in managing spending. Further, a detailed analytic of day-by-day spending also helps in better financial controls.

Payroll & Finance Management.title: Vendor Payment Tracking
Payroll & Finance Management.description: Vigo, as the best school management software in India, takes a step ahead and manages this issue by offering a vendor payment tracking feature.

Employee/HRM Management.title: Smart Employee Recruitment
Employee/HRM Management.description: After interviewing and assigning jobs, the onboarding and KYC process begins, which takes extra time due to the large amount of paperwork, but this school management software makes things easy.

Employee/HRM Management.title: Attendance & Leave Sync with Payroll
Employee/HRM Management.description: This feature helps schools manage their expenditures by restricting payments for unexpected leaves. This is because teachers have to do biometric attendance to get a salary day count in their earning patterns.

Employee/HRM Management.title: Role-Wise Permission Control
Employee/HRM Management.description: Having a role in software is common for the crew, but to protect sensitive data, admins have the authority to restrict individual access to the data.

Employee/HRM Management.title: Performance Review Panel
Employee/HRM Management.description: With a detailed performance review panel where reviews and achievements of staff and teachers are listed, this software lets admins make changes by rewarding or pushing staff for the best outcomes.

Employee/HRM Management.title: Leave Approvals
Employee/HRM Management.description: Staff, including teachers, have a separate leave section where only requests regarding leaves are going to be handled. Teachers will send a request with their unique digital signature, and admins can approve or disapprove it.

Employee/HRM Management.title: ID Cards
Employee/HRM Management.description: Once the individuals are onboard, the administration assigns them personalized digital IDs and cards. These cards hold all necessary information, including the school logo and individual information.

Employee/HRM Management.title: General Payslips
Employee/HRM Management.description: Generating and sharing payslips for teachers and other staff helps the administration manage financial issues effortlessly. It’s all thanks to our developers who develop such future-rich management software for schools.

Employee/HRM Management.title: Staff Event Calendar
Employee/HRM Management.description: With the inbuilt staff event calender feature, we let admins set meetings with staff with almost no effort. This helps them in organizing meetings, trainings, and staff events with reminders and attendance tracking.

Employee/HRM Management.title: Digital Resignation
Employee/HRM Management.description: We make the resignation process hassle-free by offering diverse features like online submission, clearance forms, and feedback collection. This all helps the administration in managing diverse services regarding the resignation process.

faqDataOne.title: Why do we need a school management system?
faqDataOne.desc: A school management system is a compulsory addition for 2025, which helps schools manage multiple tasks and the use of resources. It automates day-to-day school operations to save time while also improving overall communication between staff, admins, parents and students.

faqDataOne.title: Why do we need a school management system?
faqDataOne.desc: A school management system is a compulsory addition for 2025, which helps schools manage multiple tasks and the use of resources. It automates day-to-day school operations to save time while also improving overall communication between staff, admins, parents and students.

faqDataOne.title: How Much Does a School Management ERP Software Cost?
faqDataOne.desc: The average cost of school management ERP software varies between $ 12,000 to $15, 000 but there are multiple factors like software functionalities and new-gen technologies integration that directly affect this cost.

faqDataTwo.title: How does the school management system help schools?
faqDataTwo.desc: It reduces manual paperwork, which directly decreases workload and the cost spent on huge amounts of paperwork. Further, it offers error-free data handling and provides real-time insights for better decisions while playing an important role in parent-school engagement.

faqDataTwo.title: What is the Best School Management System?
faqDataTwo.desc: A school management system that adapts to your school’s workflow without causing any further complexities is always the best one. Vigo School is tremendous in adaptability and makes itself an ideal choice with its user-friendly interface, customizable modules, and dedicated support.

faqDataTwo.title: Does Vigo offer a vehicle tracking service?
faqDataTwo.desc: Yes, offering students customized and comfortable routes is also one of our main concerns.
